title: Check If String Is Transformable With Substring Sort Operations
content:
Given two strings  and , you want to transform string  into string  using the following operation any number of times:

Choose a non-empty substring in  and sort it in-place so the characters are in ascending order.

For example, applying the operation on the underlined substring in  results in .
Return  if it is possible to transform string  into string . Otherwise, return .
A substring is a contiguous sequence of characters within a string.
 








 




 and  only contain digits from  to .
